overview: Intimate Encounters presents its fourth of the series. Once again, Adam & Eve brings you the art of lovemaking. In a more passionate and intimate way than ever before. The setting for this episode has a western flair. Watch beautiful cowgirls get what they really want. It's intensity that couples can truly enjoy and relate to. Let this film reignite the passion... or maybe it will bring new ideas to light.
title: Intimate Encounters 4
